title: Georgia House - Day 35 (2026-03-18)
summary:
Overview: The Georgia House session on 2026-03-18 focused on legislative business, including the introduction of a new bill, SB 34. The session featured a prayer by Reverend Valerie Allen Thompson, highlighting the importance of prayer and trust in God during challenging times.

Key Actions:
**SB 34**: Bill introduced (first reading)

Bills Introduced (First Reading):
- SB 34

Notable Moments:
- Reverend Valerie Allen Thompson delivered a prayer, emphasizing the importance of prayer and trust in God, and using the "Lift Every Voice and Sing" hymn as a model for prayer.

Votes: No recorded votes mentioned in the transcript.

Attendance: Quorum present, as all members were required to report to their assigned seats.

Adjournment: The transcript does not mention the time of adjournment or the date of the next session.
